template<typename userIdType >
boost::shared_ptr<Options> makeConnectOptions ( std::string  pgName,
userIdType &  userId,
int  req,
std::string &  dietConfig 
)

To build options for the VISHNU authentication (connect, reconnect)command command.

Parameters:
pgName,: Represents the name of the command
userId : A callback for user identifier
req : for required parameters, 0 optional paramter whereas 1 means mandatory parameter
dietConfig : Represents the VISHNU config file
Returns:
The description of all options allowed by the command
